pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Multinomial Marginal Models // Functions for specifying and fitting marginal models for contingency tables proposed by Bergsma and Rudas (2002) doi:10.1214/aos/1015362188 here called hierarchical multinomial marginal models (hmmm) and their extensions presented by Bartolucci, Colombi and Forcina (2007) https://www.jstor.org/stable/24307737; multinomial Poisson homogeneous (mph) models and homogeneous linear predictor (hlp) models for contingency tables proposed by Lang (2004) doi:10.1214/aos/1079120140 and Lang (2005) doi:10.1198/016214504000001042. Inequality constraints on the parameters are allowed and can be tested.
